## useAddress() function

Hook for accessing the address of the connected wallet

```javascript
import { useAddress } from "@thirdweb-dev/react"
```
\#\# Usage

```javascript
import { useAddress } from "@thirdweb-dev/react"

const App = () => {
  const address = useAddress()

  return <div>{address}</div>
}
```
\#\# Types

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useAddress(): string | undefined;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string \| undefined
